statements: SELECT * FROM government_expenditures;
SELECT department_name, budget_allocation FROM government_expenditures;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures WHERE budget_allocation > 50000;
SELECT department_name, expenditure_description FROM government_expenditures ORDER BY expenditure_id;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures WHERE department_name = 'Finance' ORDER BY budget_allocation DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT expenditure_id, department_name, budget_allocation FROM government_expenditures WHERE budget_allocation > 100000 ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, SUM(budget_allocation) AS total_budget FROM government_expenditures GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures WHERE department_name LIKE 'E%' AND expenditure_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY expenditure_id ASC;
SELECT department_name, AVG(budget_allocation) AS average_budget FROM government_expenditures GROUP BY department_name HAVING AVG(budget_allocation) > 50000 ORDER BY average_budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM government_expenditures ORDER BY budget_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures WHERE expenditure_date <= '2022-10-31';
SELECT department_name, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM government_expenditures GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT department_name, allocated_amount FROM budget_allocations WHERE allocated_date >= '2022-01-01' AND allocated_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM government_expenditures ORDER BY department_name ASC, budget_amount DESC;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM government_expenditures WHERE budget_amount > 100000 ORDER BY budget_amount DESC, department_name ASC;
SELECT department_name, SUM(budget_amount) AS total_budget FROM government_expenditures GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT department_name, AVG(budget_amount) AS avg_budget FROM government_expenditures GROUP BY department_name HAVING avg_budget > 50000;
SELECT department_name, budget_amount FROM government_expenditures WHERE expenditure_date >= '2022-01-01' AND expenditure_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expenditure_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM government_expenditures;
SELECT id, amount, category FROM government_expenditures WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM budget_allocations ORDER BY agency DESC;
SELECT * FROM expenses_tracking WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT vendor, expense_date, amount FROM expenses_tracking ORDER BY expense_date ASC;
SELECT id, amount, category FROM government_expenditures WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY category DESC
SELECT * FROM budget_allocations WHERE amount < 5000 AND agency = 'Education' ORDER BY amount ASC
SELECT id, expense_date, vendor FROM expenses_tracking WHERE expense_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY expense_date DESC
SELECT category, amount FROM government_expenditures WHERE category IN ('Healthcare', 'Defense', 'Infrastructure') ORDER BY amount DESC
SELECT * FROM budget_allocations WHERE agency LIKE '%Police%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM expenses;
SELECT department, amount FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT description, amount FROM expenses ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT department, description, amount FROM expenses WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT e.department, e.description, t.transaction_date FROM expenses e JOIN transactions t ON e.id = t.expense_id;
SELECT * FROM expenses WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY description DESC
SELECT department, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM expenses GROUP BY department HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT t.id, b.total_budget, e.description FROM transactions t JOIN budgets b ON t.budget_id = b.id JOIN expenses e ON t.expense_id = e.id
SELECT d.name, count(t.id) AS num_transactions FROM departments d LEFT JOIN budgets b ON d.id = b.department_id LEFT JOIN transactions t ON b.id = t.budget_id GROUP BY d.name
SELECT e.description, e.amount, d.location FROM expenses e JOIN budgets b ON e.department = b.department_id JOIN departments d ON b.department_id = d.id ORDER BY e.amount DESC
SELECT * FROM government_agencies;
SELECT agency_name, agency_type FROM government_agencies WHERE expenditure >= 10000;
SELECT agency_name, expenditure FROM government_agencies ORDER BY expenditure DESC;
SELECT category_name, category_description FROM budget_categories WHERE id = 3;
SELECT expenditure_amount, expenditure_date FROM expenditures WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM government_agencies WHERE expenditure > 10000 ORDER BY agency_name DESC, expenditure ASC LIMIT 5

SELECT agency_name, agency_type, expenditure FROM government_agencies JOIN budget_allocations ON government_agencies.id = budget_allocations.agency_id WHERE category_id = 3 ORDER BY expenditure DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT agency_type FROM government_agencies WHERE expenditure > 5000

SELECT agency_name, SUM(amount_allocated) AS total_budget FROM government_agencies JOIN budget_allocations ON government_agencies.id = budget_allocations.agency_id GROUP BY agency_name HAVING total_budget > 500000 ORDER BY total_budget DESC

SELECT agency_name, category_name, amount_allocated, expenditure_amount, expenditure_date FROM government_agencies JOIN budget_allocations ON government_agencies.id = budget_allocations.agency_id JOIN expenditures ON budget_allocations.category_id = expenditures.category_id WHERE expenditure_amount > 10000 ORDER BY expenditure_date DESC LIMIT 5
